nodes.text: Gauron Nas Tal was a snarling Saurin combat trainer who worked for the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure. Despite this, the trainer aimed to hunt down its employer by 4 ABY. Having accompanied him to the Great Pit of Carkoon for the execution of several prisoners, the Saurin was present for the shootout aboard Jabba's sail barge, the Khetanna. Guaron Nas Tal did not have a chance to take action against his quarry by the downfall of both the Hutt and the Khetanna at the battle's end.
